## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f8ef5089934a6863cb12ab39ed765246f29c073c3cb1291a16d865d4a8656a86)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bps-design-system' @ 25.11.88 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
